data.text: @FaithErinn99 Hello Faith, thank you for sharing your query with us. Your backpack can be considered as an accessory if it meets our standard measurements: 40 x 30 x 15 cm (L x W x H). Furthermore, an accessory can be either of the following: handbag, briefcase, camera or laptop bag. >>
